page.title: 18Methodism in Endon (2).
page.content: As part of its anniversary celebrations of 150 years of Methodism in Endon,the local Methodist Church is inviting four of its previous ministers to return to preach at services in September.Also,during this month,they have arranged a concert by a male voice choir,a treasure hunt and barbecue,a quiz,a short play,a barn dance and an historical exhibition. To commemorate this event a souvenir book has been written,a decorative plate showing the original Methodist Church of 1835 in the village has been designed and book marks with gold lettering have been produced.
